info.description: [DRAFT] Here is the documentation of the Hotel-Spider CRS API version 2. An API key is mandatory for each call described below. [/DRAFT]
info.title: [WIP] Hotel-Spider CRS API

tags.name: Descriptive info
tags.description: All the static information at the hotel and room level: names, descriptions, pictures, amenities, etc.

tags.name: Availability summary
tags.description: Summarized information regarding the availabilities, rates and inventories. To be used to display the calendar.

tags.name: Availabilities
tags.description: All dynamic information regarding the availabilities, rates and inventories

tags.name: Cancellation policies and penalties
tags.description: Cancellation policies are the conditions that apply when a cancellation is requested (e.g. penalties)

get.summary: returns the descriptive info for a given hotel
get.description:
For more information about the code used in the returned data, please see the links below:
- for the hotel services/amenities see the [Hotel Amenity Code (HAC)](https://tourisoft.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/HOT/pages/4325557/Hotel+Amenity+Code+HAC) list
- for the room amenities see the [Room Amenity Type (RMA)](https://tourisoft.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/HOT/pages/4325585/Room+Amenity+Type+RMA) list

401.description: Unauthorized - The supplied API key does not allow you to access this resource (hotel/room type/rate plan)

get.summary: returns the products sold by a given hotel

post.summary: check the availability of a product at specific date
post.description: Before a user starts to enter his credit card details, you can check that the selected product is still available. This can be done using this call.

parameters.name: RoomStay
parameters.description: RoomStay data with associated services to be checked

areaUnitOfMeasureCode.description: Provides the unit of measure in which area is provided in this message. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unit of Measure (UOM).

distanceUnitOfMeasureCode.description: Provides the unit of measure in which distance is provided in this message. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unit of Measure (UOM).

timeZone.description: Describes the local time zone in which the hotel is located. This could include additional information regarding time zones (e.g., Daylight Saving Time observed), a proprietary code, the difference between the local time and GMT.

weightUnitOfMeasureCode.description: Provides the unit of measure in which weight is provided in this message. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unit of Measure (UOM).

whenBuilt.description: The date that the hotel facility was built, usually just the year.

code.description: The code for a service or amenity. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Hotel Amenity Code (HAC).

codeDetails.description: May be used to give further detail on the code. (Information about which list the code refers to)

standardOccupancy.description: Indicates the usual number of guests that occupy this room.

composite.description: Indicates that the room (suite) is a composite of smaller units.

quantity.description: Defines the number of the item in question. Used for Numeric values, from 1 to 9999 inclusive.

roomAmenityCode.description: Refer to OpenTravel Code List Room Amenity Type (RMA).

codeDetail.description: May be used to give further detail on the code.

RoomAmenity.description: Tangible room item(s) (e.g., newspaper) available to the guest.

items.example: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum auctor elit ut venenatis porttitor. Nullam ac massa interdum, porttitor ante non, tristique lorem. Sed hendrerit imperdiet diam at suscipit.

arrivalDate.description: The following results are given for an arrival on this date

quantity.description: The number of available rooms with this conditions

discount.description: Discount amount offered on this product

isBar.description: Whether this product is the Best Available Rate or not

availability.description: Number of rooms that are available through this rate

limitedOffer.description: Whether this product is a limited offer or not

guestRoomId.description: ID of the selected room type

rateplanId.description: ID of the selected rate plan

startDate.description: Start date of the stay (date of arrival)

endDate.description: End date of the stay (date of departure)

nbAdults.description: Number of adults for the stay

nbChildren.description: Number of children for the stay

nbInfants.description: Number of infants for the stay

totalDiscount.description: Total of the discounts on the stay

correlationId.description: The correlation ID has to be submitted together with the reservation when done

discount.description: Discount amount offered on this service

included.description: Whether the service price is included in the roomstay price or not

pictures.description: Pictures of the service (array of URLs)

CurrencyCode.description: An ISO 4217 (3) alpha character code that specifies a monetary unit.

CancelPenalties.example: Attention: Prepaid rate category. Booking policies differ from general hotel policy! Cancellation: Please note, if cancelled or modified, the total price of the non-refundable rate of the reservation will be charged on the credit card! Non refundable deposit of 100% of the full stay including tax is required at the time of booking.

roomStays.cancelPenalties: Attention: Prepaid rate category. Booking policies differ from general hotel policy! Cancellation: Please note, if cancelled or modified, the total price of the non-refundable rate of the reservation will be charged on the credit card! Non refundable deposit of 100% of the full stay including tax is required at the time of booking.

Attention: Prepaid rate category. Booking policies differ from general hotel policy! Cancellation: Please note, if cancelled or modified, the total price of the non-refundable rate of the reservation will be charged on the credit card! Non refundable deposit of 100% of the full stay including tax is required at the time of booking.

comments: We will arrive after 20h. If possible we would prefer a room in the upper floors.
We will arrive after 20h. If possible we would prefer a room in the upper floors.

example.cancelPenalties: Attention: Prepaid rate category. Booking policies differ from general hotel policy! Cancellation: Please note, if cancelled or modified, the total price of the non-refundable rate of the reservation will be charged on the credit card! Non refundable deposit of 100% of the full stay including tax is required at the time of booking.

ageQualifyingCode.description: A code representing the age category: 10 (Adults), 8 (Children), 7 (Infants)

HotelDescriptiveInfo_affiliationInfo.description: Provides information regarding affiliations, loyalty programs and award ratings.The AffiliationInfo object is used to identify the brand or franchise affiliations of the hotel.

HotelDescriptiveInfo_facilityInfo.description: Provides information pertaining to the hotel facility itself. Describes the facilities provided at the hotel, including meeting rooms and restaurants.

HotelDescriptiveInfo_policies.description: Provides information about the hotel policies (payment, guarantees, etc.)

dimensionCategory.description: Used to define the category of the image

detailsCode.description: Used to designate a particular type of additional information. [Here is the list of the possible Additional Detail Type (ADT) values](https://tourisoft.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/HOT/pages/4325600/Additional+Detail+Type+ADT)

MultimediaDescription_texts.example: [{"detailsCode":2,"text":"This is the property description"},{"detailsCode":71,"text":"This is the restaurant description"}]
